title: AGGN May Open Tournament

embed.description: Razer Arena makes organizing and competing in your own tournaments easier than ever. Complete with features that allow for easy match creation, automatic reporting of results, scheduled match notifications, fair competitive play. Arena is truly the best way to take your passion for gaming up a notch.

body:
For anyone wanting to earn some nice prizes which include razer gear for the ENTIRE TEAM then join this tournament. Happening this weekend. There are currently only 3 teams signed up and I'd love to see some more competition that the Oceania can bring forward. Again this Tournament is open to ANY rank. Prizes are listed in the attached link. Hope to see more teams sign up!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Would like to make a team for this if anyone's keen..
